attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop Rupert Murdoch(Sky) and others forcing BBC ( in particular BBC News Online) to be paid content for the good of Sky shareholders.
Protect at all costs the right of the British people to receive unbiased, up to date news from the BBC for free, through the web site, TV or Radio, worldwide.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
